from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

import sys
import os

from .autoval import AutovalUtils
from .autoval_exceptions import TestError

sys.path.append(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "..", "..", "..", ".."))
sys.path.append(
    os.path.
    join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "..", "..", "\
        ..", "..", "..")
)
sys.path.append(os.path.join(
    os.path.dirname(__file__),
    "..",
    "..",
    "..",
))



[docs]class KernelUtils:

[docs]    @staticmethod
    def get_kernel_module_path():
        kernel = KernelUtils.get_kernel_version()
        module_path = "/lib/modules/%s/kernel/" % kernel
        return module_path



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def get_kernel_version():
        try:
            kernel = AutovalUtils.run_get_output("uname -r")
            return (kernel)
        except Exception as e:
            raise TestError("Failed to get Kernel version - %s" % (e))



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def remove_modules(modules, ignore_status=False):
        for module in modules:
            cmd = "modprobe -r %s" % module
            AutovalUtils.run_get_output(cmd, ignore_status=ignore_status)



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def depmod_modules():
        cmd = "depmod -a"
        AutovalUtils.run_get_output(cmd)
